name: VR12AndPROMIS10GlobalPROTools

purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify the following patient reported outcome tools:

VR-12
PROMIS 10 Global),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Assessment, Performed datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains LOINC codes to identify the following patient reported outcome tools:

VR-12
PROMIS 10 Global),(Exclusion Criteria: VR-36 terms are excluded.  PROMIS individual questions.)
